meanings.definition: A person or company that sells goods or services.
meanings.sent1: The venders at the market had colorful stalls.
meanings.sent2: Local venders set up their stands every Saturday.
meanings.sent3: The venders decided to have a race to see who could sell the most.
meanings.sent4: The venders were like busy bees buzzing around their products.
meanings.sent5: I remember the venders' cheerful faces as they offered their wares.

meanings.sent1: She venders handmade jewelry at the craft fair.
meanings.sent2: They venders fresh produce from their farm.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to venders its toys to the other pets.
meanings.sent4: His words venders hope to those in need.
meanings.sent5: The music venders joy to all who listen.
